column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////We used the Nowait app
column2: though it only has restaurants in the Chicago area. We had the Garden Skillet
column3: Wild Pan crepes with fresh glazed strawberries
column4: and the silver dollar pancakes. The whipped cream on the side had no sugar
column5: it was bland and flavorless. However
column6: the whipped cream on the crepes was good. The Garden Skillet was tasty with a lot of veggies. Silver dollar pancakes were excellent
column7: coffee is good. Would come back. We reserved a spot in line with the Nowait app
column8: and it was about a five minute wait. It was approximately a ten minute wait from when we ordered to our food getting here. It was crowded
column9: but the service was fast. The only complaint is that the portions were big and we had leftovers.
